name: Box 'n' Robot
description:
Box 'n ' Robot is an old school box pushing puzzle game with randomly generated levels. Walk  around a ship filled with boxes, with the task of turning off all the lights.

The game has four modes:

  • Mini (10 Levels)
  • Standard (25 Levels)
  • Super (50 Levels)
  • Endless

Enjoy!

Controls:

  • Arrow Keys - Move
  • R - Reset Level
